Use Cases

The PALANTIR consortium is composed of 15 partners around Europe, well distributed between legal bodies, private companies, large corporations, and research and academic partners. The diversity of expertise within PALANTIR is essential in order to achieve the technological challenges of the project.


  • DBC Europe S.A. - Project coordinator

    DBC Europe operates in Brussels since 2015 and has extensive experience in European funded technical assistance projects and EU Horizon grants. DBC-Europe S.A. is subsidiary of DIADIKASIA Business Consulting (DBC) in Greece ranging among the most extrovert and competiti...

  • Universidad de Murcia (UMU)

    The University of Murcia (UMU) is a large university with approximately 36,000 students and 3,000 staff members. For the Faculty of Computer Science, the Intelligent Systems and Telematics Group, from the Department of Information and Communications Engineering will be p...

  • Fundació i2CAT, Internet I Innovació Digital a Catalunya (i2CAT)

    i2CAT is a non-profit technology centre that promotes R&D and Innovation activities in the field of Information and Communication Technologies and the Future Internet. The centre invests in a new model of innovation, the Quadruple Helix, based on the collaboration...

  • Sfera IT

    Sfera IT offers the services of designing, implementation and managing communications and security of IT systems and the possibility of buying or renting appropriate IT equipment. The team of experts carries out the most complex communication networks, cyber data protec...

  • inCITES Consulting S.A.

    inCITES Consulting S.A. is an SME company established in Luxembourg. It was founded on May 2013 and its main activities rely on telecommunications techno-economics, regulatory economics and policies, demand forecasting, business and price modeling.

  • Hewlett-Packard Limited (Labs) (HPELB)

    Hewlett-Packard provides business offerings in more than 170 countries, centred on infrastructures and services that transform IT into a business enabler allowing our customers to operate their business effectively and efficiently. Hewlett-Packard Labs is the explorat...

  • National Centre for Scientific Research Demokritos (NCSRD)

  • Orion Innovations Private Company (ORION)

  • Politecnico di Torino (POLITO)

    POLITO is one of the major technical universities in Italy, fully devoted to engineering and architecture education, with about 30,000 students at the bachelor, master and doctorate levels. POLITO is a research university, with nearly 60% of its budget coming from re...

  • NEC Laboratories Europe (NLE)

  • Telefónica Investigación y desarrollo S.A.U. (TID)

  • UBITECH Ltd.

  • Infili Technologies Private Company (INFILI)

    Infili is a research intensive SME that utilizes a unique combination of high-end technologies as an outcome of many years of R&D experience and is structured around a pool of highly qualified and motivated engineers with expertise in international projects.

  • STRATIOTIKI SXOLI EVELPIDON (SSE)
